Class TimeDepositAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
      • SavingsAccount
        • TimeDepositAccount

  • public class TimeDepositAccount
extends SavingsAccount
    Simulates a time deposit bank account
    Version:
    11.21.16
    Author:
    Daniel Phan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimeDepositAccount(double balance, int months, double interestRate)
      Creates a new TimeDepositAccount with the given initial balance, interest rate, and months (Postcondition: balance, interestRate, and months are initialized)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInterest()
      Adds interest to the account, and reduces the months to maturity by one (Postcondition: months is decremented by 1, and the balance is increased by the interest rate) (Precondition: interestRate > 0)
      double withdraw(double amount)
      Withdraws a certain amount of money from this account, if possible $10 is deducted from the account balance if the account has not matured (Postcondition: the amount withdrawn is returned)

      • Methods inherited from class SavingsAccount

        toString

      • Methods inherited from class BankAccount

        deposit, getBalance, setBalance

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimeDepositAccount

        public TimeDepositAccount(double balance,
                          int months,
                          double interestRate)
        Creates a new TimeDepositAccount with the given initial balance, interest rate, and months (Postcondition: balance, interestRate, and months are initialized)
        Parameters:
        balance - the initial balance
        interestRate - the interest rate of the account
        months - the number of months to maturity (Precondition: balance, interestRate, and months are initialized)

    • Method Detail

      • addInterest

        public void addInterest()
        Adds interest to the account, and reduces the months to maturity by one (Postcondition: months is decremented by 1, and the balance is increased by the interest rate) (Precondition: interestRate > 0)
        Overrides:
        addInterest in class SavingsAccount

      • withdraw

        public double withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraws a certain amount of money from this account, if possible $10 is deducted from the account balance if the account has not matured (Postcondition: the amount withdrawn is returned)
        Overrides:
        withdraw in class SavingsAccount
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to withdraw
        Returns:
        the amount withdrawn; 0 if there is not enough money (Precondition: amount >= 0)
